title: Talentblaze Fractional Talent Acquisition Service Website

requirements.summary: Create homepage with hero section introducing Talentblaze
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays Talentblaze branding prominently
Clear value proposition for startups in India and global firms

file_operations.description: Create hero section component featuring Talentblaze branding with value proposition for Indian startups and global firms. Use generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png and logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/talentblaze-logo.dim_400x120.png as static assets.
Wire HeroSection component into the main App component at the top of the page layout.

requirements.summary: Create About section explaining fractional talent acquisition model
acceptanceCriteria: Explains fractional talent acquisition concept clearly
Highlights benefits for startups and global firms
Professional tone appropriate for B2B services

file_operations.description: Create About section component explaining the fractional talent acquisition model with clear benefits for Indian startups and global firms establishing operations in India. Maintain professional B2B tone.
Wire AboutSection component into App below HeroSection.

requirements.summary: Create Services section outlining talent acquisition offerings
acceptanceCriteria: Clearly differentiates services for each target segment
Includes visual elements to enhance readability

file_operations.description: Create Services section component listing core talent acquisition offerings with clear differentiation for Indian startups and global firms. Include visual elements such as icons or cards to enhance readability.
Wire ServicesSection component into App below AboutSection.

requirements.summary: Create Contact section with contact form for client inquiries
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form captures name, email, company, and message
Form submission stores inquiries in backend

file_operations.description: Create Contact section component with a form capturing name, email, company name, and inquiry message. Call backend submitContactRequest method on form submission and display success confirmation. Handle form validation and loading states.
Wire ContactSection component into App below ServicesSection.

requirements.summary: Apply professional, modern visual theme with warm colors and clean typography
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette using warm, professional tones
Layout maintains visual coherence across all sections
Design conveys trust and professionalism for business clients

file_operations.description: Define global styles with warm, trustworthy color palette (avoiding blue and purple), professional typography hierarchy, and cohesive spacing patterns suitable for B2B brand.
Configure Tailwind theme with warm color palette (e.g., amber, orange, warm grays), professional font families, and consistent spacing scale to support the B2B visual identity.
